content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-22.5, 27.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position -22.5, 27.5)

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position x) 

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all power-generating entities, such as steam engines, are correctly placed and operational to avoid power shortages in connected structures like labs.
- Check the connections between electric poles and the structures they supply to ensure they are properly linked.

### Errors when expected entities are missing
- Verify the presence and correct positioning of all required entities before executing actions that depend on them, such as steam engines for power generation.
